snippet: The Yankees’ Mark Teixeira practiced bunting in the off-season, including batting cages in Connecticut owned by the Red Sox Manager Bobby Valentine.
abstract: New York Yankees first baseman Mark Teixeira acknowledges that working on his bunting in the off-season has helped his swing.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Mark Teixeira practiced bunting in the off-season, including batting cages in Connecticut owned by the Red Sox Manager Bobby Valentine.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Teixeira, Working on Bunt, Improves Swing
headline.main: Teixeira’s Work on Bunt Has Helped His Swing
headline.print_headline: Teixeira’s Work on Bunt Has Helped His Swing
